title: Press Release: Congresswoman Lateefah Simon Advocates for End to Gaza Genocide and Supports Block the Bombs Act
text:
Congresswoman Simon advocates for ending violence in Gaza and supports the Block the Bombs Act, joined by various advocates.
Quiver AI Summary
On September 11, 2025, Congresswoman Lateefah Simon (D-CA-12) participated in a press conference with other members of Congress and advocates to promote the Block the Bombs Act (H.R. 3565). This proposed legislation aims to restrict the transfer of offensive weapons to Israel and ensure compliance with U.S. and international law.
During the event, Simon emphasized the urgent need to end what she described as genocide against Palestinians, linking the ongoing violence to the broader context of warfare and peace. She stated, “We cannot send bombs to a government that uses access to food as a weapon of war.”
The Congresswoman called for a commitment to a just peace, recognizing the suffering of both Palestinians and Israelis. She stressed the importance of moral actions from government officials to stop the violence, saying, “The United States government can no longer be complicit in the murdering of children.”
